item.title: Long-Term Care 2.0 Service Integration Platform
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: A long-term care service integration platform designed to improve Taiwan’s long-term care environment. The concept of this project is to bring long-term care services into the home, reducing the burden on family members. By designing convenient APP calling methods for elderly users to operate the system independently.
